headline: TD Cowen Raises Mondelez (MDLZ) Target While North America Volumes Remain Weak
summary: Mondelez International, Inc. (NASDAQ:MDLZ) is included among the 15 Best Wide Moat Dividend Stocks to Invest in. On February 4, TD Cowen lifted its price target on Mondelez International, Inc. (NASDAQ:MDLZ) to $65 from $62 and maintained a Buy rating. The firm noted that management’s early outlook for 2026 came in below consensus, with organic […]
